sn12.17:7.1: Catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena → accayena parivutthaparivāsaṃ (bj, s1-3, km) | accayena parivuṭṭhaparivāsaṃ (pts1-2, mr)
bhikkhū → bhikkhū ākaṅkhamānā (s1-3, km, pts1-2, mr)
sn12.17:8.1: Catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena → accayena parivutthaparivāsaṃ (bj) | accayena parivutthaparivāse (s1-3, km) | accayena parivuṭṭhaparivāsaṃ (pts1-2, mr)
bhikkhū → bhikkhū ākaṅkhamānā (s1-3, km, pts1-2, mr)
catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena → accayena parivutthaparivāsaṃ (bj, s1-3, km) | accayena parivuṭṭhaparivāsaṃ (pts1-2, mr)
